nodes.text: Jori was a male a CorSec agent turned criminal who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

By the time of the Battle of Yavin, Jori was an agent of the Corellian Security Force on Corellia. Circa 1 ABY, Jori betrayed the CorSec by selling out to the Deflarians and Ragtags. He gave information concerning a cargo of weapons carried by CorSec Captain Donovan to the criminals. The Deflarians hijacked the ship to steal the weapons and sell them to the Ragtags, and captured Captain Donovan. After Inspector Cora and a spacer rescued Donovan, CorSec Captain Jark sent the spacer to raid a meeting between Deflarians and Ragtags. Jori was killed during the operation and the CorSec managed to retrieve vital information about Tyrena defense capabilities provided by the traitor to the Ragtags.

Jori was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Jori was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 28", on April 26, 2006. His appearance was randomly generated, but the quest dialogue identified him as a male.
